properties.name: CSUN, Jacaranda Hall (Engineering Building)
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre Houses the engineering, computer science, and health science departments at CSUN.

properties.name: Canyon Country Park
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre   Canyon Country ParkSoftball field (outfield often used for soccer or football), short running/workout path, play equipment (two locations), two smaller fields for soccer practice, volleyball, etc.

properties.name: College of the Canyons
properties.description: Posted by RenaistreCollege of the Canyons, home of the Cougars. Santa Clarita\'s community college

properties.name: Davis Dam
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre   Davis DamA nice place to stop and cool off if you happen to be in the area.

properties.name: Ed Davis Park
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre   "Ed Davis Park in Towsley Canyon is named for former State Senator Ed Davis, who championed the preservation of Towsley Canyon. The park offers visitors a peaceful haven just west of the I-5 between the Santa Clarita and San Fernando Valleys." - LAMountains.com

properties.name: Living Hope Evangelical Fellowship
properties.description: Posted by RenaistreMeets on Sundays at 10:00 A.M. at Wiley Canyon Elementry School.

properties.name: Mt. Whitney Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre I stopped at this restaurant on the way down from my first attempt at Whitney in April 2006. They claim to have the best burgers in town, and I just might have to agree with them. They have lots of pictures on the walls of the stars that filmed movies in the nearby hills. There\'s more info on the Lone Pine CoC website.

properties.name: Next to my old house
properties.description: Posted by RenaistreI was raking weeds on the hill next to my house around 9:00 A.M. when my dad came outside and told me that the towers had fallen. It is the only time I\'ve ever seen him look scared.

properties.name: Santa Clarita Baptist Church
properties.description: Posted by RenaistreMeets on Sundays at 9:00 A.M. (Sunday school), 10:00 A.M. (morning worship service), and 6:00 P.M. (evening worship service).

properties.name: Vasquez Rocks County Park
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre   Location of many movie sets and TV commercials. The Flintstones movie was filmed here in the mid \'90s. The Pacific Crest Trail also cuts through the park. Location of an annual Easter sunrise service.

properties.name: William S. Hart County Park
properties.description: Posted by Renaistre   From the park website: "The former home and ranch of William S. Hart, silent film cowboy star and director. The Museum sits atop a hill within a large park area." Aside from the museum, the park grounds are home to a barnyard area with various animals, a gift shop, large shady lawns and picnic areas, and Hart Hall which can be rented for events such as weddings or small concerts.
